venue.name: KO Pub and Pies EAST BOSTON

item.description:
After the controversy surrounding Game 1, Game 2 of the series is sure to be a ripper. Sam from KO Pies has offered to host the game at the brand new KO Pub and Pies in East Boston, so come along and enjoy a pie, a beer and footy on the big screen.


The new premises are located inside East Boston Marina, there is plenty of free parking right there and is easily accessible by T (Maverick stop on the Blue Line) or water taxi (http://www.citywatertaxi.com).

Â 

We'll start the prematch coverage at 7pm, with kickoff at 7:30pm.

See you there,

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: State of Origin - Game 2
